oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Illinois Monument at General Bragg's Headquarters, Missionary Ridge, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted and enhanced photograph of the Illinois Monument located on the Bragg Reservation along Missionary Ridge. Features a white border, divided back and narrative on reverse. This postcard comes from the Tennessee Historical Society Collection. [No. 5807]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Monuments & memorials; Roads; Aerial photographs
